Uses of Class
rlu.sqltrainer.domain.Feedback

Packages that use Feedback
rlu.sqltrainer.application Contains application classes which provide a user interface independent API for the SQLTrainer. 
 

Uses of Feedback in rlu.sqltrainer.application
 

Methods in rlu.sqltrainer.application that return Feedback
 Feedback SQLTrainer.provideFeedback()
          Creates a feedback for the current exercise or for the whole exercise set if currExerciseIdx is -1.
 Feedback SimpleFeedbackStrategy.provideFeedback(ExerciseSet exSet, int exIdx, java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> aData, java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> sData)
          Just compares the two tables and provides some comments.
 Feedback FeedbackStrategy.provideFeedback(ExerciseSet exSet, int exIdx, java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> aData, java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> sData)
          Returns a feedback for a given answer.
 Feedback SQLTrainer.provideFeedback(int exerciseIdx)
          Executes the answer of the specified exercise (an SQL statement) on the database server and also the solution of the specified exercise and asks the used feedback strategy for a feedback.
